channel.title: CVE Feed for shakee93 -- RapidLoad Power-Up for Autoptimize
channel.description: The latest CVEs for shakee93 -- RapidLoad Power-Up for Autoptimize

item.title: CVE-2023-1339|2023-03-10T19:19:45.912Z -- shakee93 -- rapidload%20power-up%20for%20autoptimize
item.description: The RapidLoad Power-Up for Autoptimize plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized settings update due to a missing capability check on the uucss_update_rule function in versions up to, and including, 1.7.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with subscriber-level access to update caching rules.
